info.name: Restful Booker Test
info.description:
This collection demonstrates different ways to perform CRUD web API testing. It uses different test validations with different request and response formats (i.e., JSON, XML, and form URL encoded data).

The web service API used is Restfulbooker API which can be found in this [link](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/apidoc/index.html).

exec: pm.test("#TEST: Ping Request: Status code is 201", function () {
pm.test("#TEST: Ping Request: Body is correct", function () {

request.description: Sends a ping request to the Restfulbooker API to determine if the service is up. The API documentation can be found in this [link](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/apidoc/index.html#api-Ping-Ping).

exec: pm.test("#TEST: Auth Request: Status code is 200", function () {

request.description:
Sends an authentication request to create a new auth token. The token can be saved and later used for the PUT and DELETE /booking requests.

The API documentation can be found in this [link](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/apidoc/index.html#api-Auth-CreateToken).

item.name: Get Booking IDs with Filter by Date  - JSON

exec: pm.test("#TEST: Get Booking IDs Filter by Date Request: Status code is 200", function () {
pm.test("#TEST: Get Booking IDs Filter by Date - JSON: JSON response data validation", () => {
console.error("JSON response data validation failed! " + e);
pm.test("#TEST: Get Booking IDs Filter by Date - JSON: JSON response schema validation", () => {
pm.test("#TEST: Get Booking IDs Filter by Date - JSON: Booking ID validation", () => {
console.log("#TEST: Get Booking IDs Filter by Name - List of Booking empty");
// send a request to get booking details for each booking ID returned
pm.test("#TEST: Get Booking IDs Filter by Date - JSON: Checkin and Checkout Date validation", () => {
//validate checkin and checkout date of each booking id
console.log("Filter by checkin=" + checkin + " and checkout=" + checkout);
//pm.expect(_.gte(jsonData2.bookingdates.checkin, checkin), "Returned checkin date " + jsonData2.bookingdates.checkin + " should be >= " + checkin);
"Returned checkin date " + jsonData2.bookingdates.checkin + " should be >= " + checkin).to.be.true;
//pm.expect(_.lte(jsonData2.bookingdates.checkout, checkout), "Returned checkout date " + jsonData2.bookingdates.checkout + " should be <= " + checkout);
"Returned checkout date " + jsonData2.bookingdates.checkout + " should be <= " + checkout).to.be.true;
